/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/gather.dir/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/gather.dir/cmake_device_link.o  /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread
